title: Stories from Yambuk Youth
creator_credit: Kim Montgomery, David Withers, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
brief_description: Five boys from Yambuk talk about what it means to be young in a small regional town and the various activities the town has to offer. They tell of the fun times growing up in the country, what they would like to change about the world and their ambitions for the future.
creator_credit_for_label: Kim Montgomery, David Withers, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
